title: Efficacy evaluation of the Cuban vaccine VA-MENGOC-BC® against disease caused by serogroup B Neisseria meningitidis
author: Sierra G V G; Campa H C; Garcia I L; Sotolongo P F; Izquierdo P L; Valcarel N M; Casanueva G V; Baro S M; Leguen C F; Rodriguez C R; Terry M H
description: Efficacy evaluation of the Cuban vaccine VA-MENGOC-BC® against disease caused by serogroup B Neisseria meningitidis was published in Neisseriae 1990 on page 129.
